root.name: Glory of Heracles
root.description: OverviewGlory of Heracles is the fifth game in its series, which started back on the original Famicom. While the earlier titles in the series were produced and published by the now-defunct Data East, Nintendo sought to publish a new game in the series for the DS and teamed up with the property holder Paon, a company comprised of former Data East staff. The game's scenario was written by Kazushige Nojima, who had previously worked on entries in the Final Fantasy series, most notably Final Fantasy VII, in addition to his work as the scenario writer for the third and fourth Heracles titles. Combat in the game is a turn-based affair, with special attacks that can be powered up by completing a mini-game on the touch-screen. The game was released in North America on January 18, 2010.
